trigger_description: This trigger fires when the temperature rises above the set value (Celsius).
This trigger fires when the room becomes darker than the set category.
This trigger fires when the room becomes brighter than the set value.
This trigger fires when the room becomes brighter than the set category.
This trigger fires when the humidity rises above the set value.
This trigger fires when the room becomes darker than the set value.
This trigger fires when the humidity drops below the set value.
This trigger fires when the temperature drops below the set value (Celsius).
